title: Take control of your music player from terminal
author: zuck007
content: readme.md xplayplay songs cliinstallationpip install xplayusage$ xplay -husage: xplay [-h] [-s set] [-g genre [genre ...]] [- artist [artist ...]] [-t title [title ...]]play song terminaloptional arguments: -h, --help show help message exit -s set, --set set set music_dir folder, default is ~/music/ -g genre [genre ...], --genre genre [genre ...] play song the given genre - artist [artist ...], --artist artist [artist ...] play song the given artist -t title [title ...], --title title [title ...] play song the given titlescreencastrelatedmusicquery package
